Object.Field: <map-generation-info> <node name="W_ORDERS_F" type="IKM" km="IKM Oracle Partition Exchange Load.Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo"> <option name="Partition Name" value="#A_TEAM.PARTITION_MONTH" default="false"/> <option name="Exchange Type" value="PARTITION" default="true"/> <option name="Degree of Parallelism" value="PARALLEL" default="true"/> <option name="Select Optimizer Hint" value="#A_TEAM.FLOW_TABLE_OPTIMIZER_HINT" default="false"/> <option name="Flow Control" value="true" default="true"/> <option name="Lock Partition" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="Partition Exchange Options" value="INCLUDING INDEXES WITH VALIDATION UPDATE INDEXES PARALLEL" default="false"/> <option name="Set Incremental Statistics" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="Set Publish Statistics" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="Disable Constraints Before Exchange" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="Rebuild Local Indexes" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="Rebuild Global Indexes" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="Enable Constraints After Exchange" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="Gather Table Statistics" value="true" default="false"/> <option name="Delete Temporary Objects" value="true" default="true"/> </node> <node name="W_ORDERS_F" type="CKM" km="CKM Oracle.Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo"> <option name="DROP_ERROR_TABLE" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="DROP_CHECK_TABLE" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="CREATE_ERROR_INDEX" value="true" default="true"/> <option name="COMPATIBLE" value="9" default="true"/> <option name="VALIDATE" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="UPGRADE_ERROR_TABLE" value="false" default="true"/> </node> <target name="W_ORDERS_F" resource="W_ORDERS_F" model="FACTS" logicalSchema="Warehouse" forcedContext=""/> </map-generation-info>

insert into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select SYS_GUID(), '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>', rowid, 'F', '', sysdate, '(7)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Partition Exchange Load - Flow Control - With Validation - Update Indexes', 'W_ORDERS_F_CHK9', 'CK', ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> W_ORDERS_F where not ( CUST_WID IS NOT NULL AND PRODUCT_WID IS NOT NULL )

delete from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "SNP_CHECK_TAB", "W") ?> where SCHEMA_NAME = '<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' and ORIGIN = '(7)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Partition Exchange Load - Flow Control - With Validation - Update Indexes' and ERR_TYPE = 'F'

insert /*+ APPEND */ into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> select <$="#A_TEAM.FLOW_TABLE_OPTIMIZER_HINT"$> ORDERS_1.ORDER_NUM, ORDERS_1.ORDER_DT, W_STATUS_D.ROW_WID, W_CUSTOMER_D_1.ROW_WID, W_PRODUCT_D.ROW_WID, ORDERS_1.PRICE * ORDERS_1.QUANTITY, ORDERS_1.CREATED_DT, ORDERS_1.UPDATED_DT from ((( SELECT ORDERS.ORDER_NUM ORDER_NUM , ORDERS.ORDER_DT ORDER_DT , ORDERS.ORDER_STATUS ORDER_STATUS , ORDERS.CUST_ID CUST_ID , ORDERS.PROD_ID PROD_ID , ORDERS.QUANTITY QUANTITY , ORDERS.PRICE PRICE , ORDERS.CREATED_DT CREATED_DT , ORDERS.UPDATED_DT UPDATED_DT FROM <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "ORDERS", "Staging", "D") ?> ORDERS WHERE (ORDERS.ORDER_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('#A_TEAM.PARTITION_MONTH','#A_TEAM.PartitionDateFormat') AND LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('#A_TEAM.PARTITION_MONTH','#A_TEAM.PartitionDateFormat')) AND '#A_TEAM.FLOW_TABLE_OPTIMIZER_HINT' = '#A_TEAM.FLOW_TABLE_OPTIMIZER_HINT' ) ) ORDERS_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "W_STATUS_D", "Warehouse", "D") ?> W_STATUS_D ON ORDERS_1.ORDER_STATUS = W_STATUS_D.STATUS_CD ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT W_CUSTOMER_D.ROW_WID ROW_WID , W_CUSTOMER_D.CUST_ID CUST_ID , W_CUSTOMER_D.CURRENT_FLAG CURRENT_FLAG FROM <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "W_CUSTOMER_D", "Warehouse", "D") ?> W_CUSTOMER_D WHERE (W_CUSTOMER_D.CURRENT_FLAG = #A_TEAM.DefaultType2CurrentFlag ) ) W_CUSTOMER_D_1 ON ORDERS_1.CUST_ID = W_CUSTOMER_D_1.CUST_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "W_PRODUCT_D", "Warehouse", "D") ?> W_PRODUCT_D ON ORDERS_1.PROD_ID = W_PRODUCT_D.PROD_ID where (1=1)

insert into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select SYS_GUID(), '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>', rowid, 'F', 'ODI-15066: The column REVENUE_AMT cannot be null.', sysdate, '(7)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Partition Exchange Load - Flow Control - With Validation - Update Indexes', 'REVENUE_AMT', 'NN', ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> where REVENUE_AMT is null

insert into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select SYS_GUID(), '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>', rowid, 'F', 'ODI-15066: The column ORDER_NUM cannot be null.', sysdate, '(7)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Partition Exchange Load - Flow Control - With Validation - Update Indexes', 'ORDER_NUM', 'NN', ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> where ORDER_NUM is null

create table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "SNP_CHECK_TAB", "W") ?> ( CATALOG_NAME <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> NULL , SCHEMA_NAME <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> NULL , RESOURCE_NAME <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> NULL, FULL_RES_NAME <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> NULL, ERR_TYPE <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1") ?> NULL, ERR_MESS <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250") ?> NULL , CHECK_DATE <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE") ?> NULL, ORIGIN <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250") ?> NULL, CONS_NAME <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "128") ?> NULL, CONS_TYPE <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2") ?> NULL, ERR_COUNT <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "10") ?> NULL )

delete from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> where (ODI_ERR_TYPE = 'S' and 'F' = 'S') or (ODI_ERR_TYPE = 'F' and ODI_ORIGIN = '(7)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Partition Exchange Load - Flow Control - With Validation - Update Indexes')

DECLARE c_fk_name varchar2(30) := ''; BEGIN c_fk_name := '<?= odiRef.getObjectShortName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?>'; IF length(c_fk_name) > 24 THEN c_fk_name := SUBSTR(c_fk_name,1,24); END IF; c_fk_name := c_fk_name||'_FK'; FOR TableConstraint IN ( SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUMBER, c2.column_name, C4.OWNER FK_OWNER, c4.table_name FK_TABLE, c4.column_name FK_COLUMN FROM all_CONSTRAINTS C1 INNER JOIN all_cons_columns C2 ON (c1.constraint_name=c2.constraint_name AND c1.table_name =c2.table_name AND c1.owner = c2.owner) INNER JOIN all_CONSTRAINTS C3 ON (c3.constraint_name = c1.r_constraint_name AND C1.OWNER = C3.OWNER) INNER JOIN all_CONS_COLUMNS C4 ON (c3.constraint_name =c4.constraint_name AND c3.table_name =c4.table_name AND c3.owner = c4.owner) WHERE C1.TABLE_NAME ='W_ORDERS_F' AND c1.owner = '<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND C1.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'R' AND C1.STATUS = 'ENABLED' ORDER BY c1.constraint_name, c2.position ) LOOP EXECUTE immediate 'alter table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> add constraint '||c_fk_name||TO_CHAR(TableConstraint.ROW_NUMBER)||' foreign key ("'||TableConstraint.COLUMN_NAME||'") references "'||TableConstraint.FK_OWNER||'"."'||TableConstraint.FK_TABLE||'" ("'||TableConstraint.FK_COLUMN||'")'; END LOOP; END;

insert into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select SYS_GUID(), '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>', rowid, 'F', '', sysdate, '(7)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Partition Exchange Load - Flow Control - With Validation - Update Indexes', 'W_ORDERS_F_CHK3', 'CK', ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> W_ORDERS_F where not ( ORDER_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-JAN-2014', 'DD-MON-YYYY') AND TO_DATE('31-DEC-2014', 'DD-MON-YYYY') )
Add Not Null to flow table
Create local indexes on flow table

delete from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> T where exists ( select 1 from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> E where ODI_SESS_NO = '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>' and T.rowid = E.ODI_ROW_ID )
/* FLOW CONTROL CREATE THE iNDEX ON THE I$TABLE */ create index W_ORDERS_F_UK1_flow on <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> (CUST_WID, ORDER_NUM)

create table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_ROW_ID UROWID, ODI_ERR_TYPE <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1") ?> NULL, ODI_ERR_MESS <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250") ?> NULL, ODI_CHECK_DATE <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE") ?> NULL, ORDER_NUM VARCHAR2(12) NULL, ORDER_DT DATE NULL, STATUS_WID NUMBER NULL, CUST_WID NUMBER NULL, PRODUCT_WID NUMBER NULL, REVENUE_AMT NUMBER NULL, CREATED_DT DATE NULL, UPDATED_DT DATE NULL, ODI_ORIGIN <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250") ?> NULL, ODI_CONS_NAME <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "128") ?> NULL, ODI_CONS_TYPE <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2") ?> NULL, ODI_PK <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "32") ?> PRIMARY KEY, ODI_SESS_NO <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "36") ?> )

insert into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select SYS_GUID(), '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>', rowid, 'F', '', sysdate, '(7)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Partition Exchange Load - Flow Control - With Validation - Update Indexes', 'W_ORDERS_F_CHK2', 'CK', ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> W_ORDERS_F where not ( ORDER_NUM IS NOT NULL )

insert into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select SYS_GUID(), '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>', rowid, 'F', 'ODI-15066: The column PRODUCT_WID cannot be null.', sysdate, '(7)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Partition Exchange Load - Flow Control - With Validation - Update Indexes', 'PRODUCT_WID', 'NN', ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> where PRODUCT_WID is null

insert into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select SYS_GUID(), '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>', rowid, 'F', 'ODI-15064: The primary key W_ORDERS_F_PK is not unique.', '(7)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Partition Exchange Load - Flow Control - With Validation - Update Indexes', sysdate, 'W_ORDERS_F_PK', 'PK', W_ORDERS_F.ORDER_NUM, W_ORDERS_F.ORDER_DT, W_ORDERS_F.STATUS_WID, W_ORDERS_F.CUST_WID, W_ORDERS_F.PRODUCT_WID, W_ORDERS_F.REVENUE_AMT, W_ORDERS_F.CREATED_DT, W_ORDERS_F.UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> W_ORDERS_F where exists ( select SUB.ORDER_NUM from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> SUB where SUB.ORDER_NUM=W_ORDERS_F.ORDER_NUM group by SUB.ORDER_NUM having count(1) > 1 )
